name: Mr.Chip
description:
The main character who gambled with people.
He was the main character who went all-in with a good hand, but he lost.
The main character who lost all his money got dizzy at the moment
At that moment, the people around me start to look like paintings.

Can they survive the attacks of people who have turned into pictures?


It's a side-scrolling action game. It's pixelated, but it has some characters that are attractive with picturesque graphics.
It only supports single play, and lives with the gambling addict protagonist and meets the end of the story in person.
